edu.thu.keg.mdap.provider

Interface DataProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataProvider, HiveProvider, JdbcProvider

    public interface DataProvider
    Represents a data provider storing datasets. Can be a SQL database, Hive, HDFS files, etc.. A DataProvider object is uniquely identified by a Connection String
    Author:
    Yuanchao Ma

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeQuery(Query q)
      Close a query and release resource.
      java.lang.String getConnectionString() 
      java.lang.Object getValue(Query q, DataField field)
      Get value of current record of a query, of the given field

      Advance a previously opened query

      Open(run) the query against the data provider, and open the stream for reading data

      Remove a dataset content from the provider
      void writeDataSetContent(DataSet ds, DataContent data)

    • Method Detail

      • openQuery

        void openQuery(Query query)
               throws DataProviderException
        Open(run) the query against the data provider, and open the stream for reading data
        Parameters:
        query - the query
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when the query is invalid, or communication with the provider returns a error.

      • getConnectionString

        java.lang.String getConnectionString()
        Returns:
        The connection string of this DataProvider

      • next

        boolean next(Query q)
             throws DataProviderException
        Advance a previously opened query
        Parameters:
        q - the query
        Returns:
        whether the query has past the last record
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when data provider gives an error

      • getValue

        java.lang.Object getValue(Query q,
                        DataField field)
                          throws DataProviderException
        Get value of current record of a query, of the given field
        Parameters:
        q - the query
        field - the field
        Returns:
        the value
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when data provider gives an error

      • closeQuery

        void closeQuery(Query q)
                throws DataProviderException
        Close a query and release resource.
        Parameters:
        q - the query
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when data provider gives an error

      • removeContent

        void removeContent(DataSet ds)
                   throws DataProviderException
        Remove a dataset content from the provider
        Parameters:
        ds - the to-be-removed dataset.
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when data provider gives an error

      • writeDataSetContent

        void writeDataSetContent(DataSet ds,
                       DataContent data)
                         throws DataProviderException
        Write to the data provider the actual data of the dataset. Existing data would be wiped first.
        Parameters:
        ds - the dataset whose data is to be written
        data - the data to be written
        Throws:
        DataProviderException - when data provider gives an error
